title: Delayed EventBridge events with EventBridge Scheduler
description: Setup future EventBridge events with EventBridge Scheduler

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern listens for EventBridge events, processes them and creates schedules for every user. 24 hours after user has been created a schedule is run that publishes events directly into EventBridge

authors.name: David Boyne
authors.bio: Senior Developer Advocate at AWS focusing on EDA and Serverless.
